modName: Craft Fur Armors and --optional-- Temper Leather Perk
summary:
Craft Fur Armors at the tanning rack

(Optional)
New perk Leather Tempering (Improve Leather, Hide, Fur and Studded type armors twice as much)
descriptionHtml:
Craft Fur Armors at the tanning rack.

Not included: Forsworn, Thievesguild (might conflict with Dawnguard DLC)
Not included: Dark Brotherhood, Nightingale and other unique armors.

Added tempering recipe for Imperial Studded Armor
Added Blades armor to Advanced Smithing Perk

V1.1
Removed the perk from the Mod and posted it as optional download. Take care the optional download is the full mod and not only the Temper Leather Perk.

New perk Leather Tempering (Improve Leather, Hide, Fur and Studded type armors twice as much)
Included: Imperial Light, Imperial Studded, Penitus Oculatus, Stormcloak, Stormcloak Officer.

Due to the added perk this mod might conflict with mods that alter the perktrees, especially the smithing tree.
author: swilden

files.name: Craft Fur Armors
files.changelogHtml:
Removed Temper Leather perk.
Optional download including the Temper Leather Perk

files.name: Craft Fur Armor PLUS Temper Leather Perk
